name: Against the Horde
description:
Against the Horde is a Survival Deckbuilding card game.

You can perform 3 actions per turn.  
Play cards from hand, or take cards from the environment to add them to your deck.  
Be careful when there are monsters in the environment row.  

You consume 1 food every day and you die if your food or health reaches 0.  
Stay alive for as many days as possible.
